title: Dinner Time!
author: verias
text:
And thus begins the newest story in Tales of the Arcana.

Seems Mandrake likes her flowers...though that wolf might have a few things to say about it. Maybe he's hungry? Or perhaps he's just looking for a friend.

See you guys next week!

Keith W.

replies.author: JD*Guest*
replies.text: The beauty of having wings: Fly away!
